item.title: Music Production YouTube Channels
item.description: Below is a list of my favourite music production YouTube channels 343 Labs - teach Ableton Live, Logic Pro, Mixing & Mastering, Composition, Music Theory, Sound Design & Synthesis, Vocal Production and much more Ableton Tips by PML - Ableton Live tips & tricks to elevate your music production game Accurate Beats - music production, music gear and beatmaking Alex Rome - everything related to music production, beat making, and songwriting Alice Yalcin Efe - Mercurial Tones Academy - anything related to electronic music, from advanced production methodologies to music documentaries and vlogs Andrew Huang - Canadian YouTube personality, musician & video producer Andertons - music hardware & software reviews Applied Acoustics Systems (AAS) - official YouTube Channel of Applied Acoustics Systems.
item.content:encoded:
Below is a list of my favourite music production YouTube channels

  • 343 Labs - teach Ableton Live, Logic Pro, Mixing & Mastering, Composition, Music Theory, Sound Design & Synthesis, Vocal Production and much more
  • Ableton Tips by PML - Ableton Live tips & tricks to elevate your music production game
  • Accurate Beats - music production, music gear and beatmaking
  • Alex Rome - everything related to music production, beat making, and songwriting
  • Alice Yalcin Efe - Mercurial Tones Academy - anything related to electronic music, from advanced production methodologies to music documentaries and vlogs
  • Andrew Huang - Canadian YouTube personality, musician & video producer
  • Andertons - music hardware & software reviews
  • Applied Acoustics Systems (AAS) - official YouTube Channel of Applied Acoustics Systems. Physical Modeling since 1998.
  • Arturia - Arturia official YouTube channel
  • BBC Maestro - inspirational online courses taught by the most experienced creators
  • Benn Jordan - music and science
  • BoBeats - videos about synthesizers and music production gear
  • Charles Cleyn - songwriting, music production, and marketing strategies to create and release great music
  • Creative Sauce - helps you on your home recording journey
  • Doctor Mix - music production hardware & software reviews, also offers mixing & mastering service
    • All Doctor Mix Reconstructions
    • All My Moog Videos
    • All Prophet Videos
    • All Roland
    • All Yamaha Videos
    • Cubase Videos
    • Doctor Mix Tips
    • Great Drum Machines, Groove Boxes & Loopers
    • World’s Best Synthesizers
  • Dom Sigalas - music producer, film composer, and musicologist
  • EDMProd - EDM production blog and resource site
  • EDM Tips - how to produce Electronic Dance Music like a pro! – Techno, House, Trance, Progressive and much, much more
  • Gear4music Synths & Tech - discover the latest synths, samplers, and software, with valuable tips and advice along the way
  • Glenn Main - Norwegian electronic music composer
  • Gospel Musicians - a plethora of instructional videos, software and resources for musicians
  • Guy Michelmore (ThinkSpace Education)
    • Film Scoring
    • Interviews
    • Music Theory
    • Music Tutorials
    • Reviews
    • Sample Library Reviews
    • Sound Tutorials
    • ThinkSpace Education Course Trailers
  • In The Mix - simplifying the recording, production, mixing and mastering process
  • Jef Gibbons - video production, photography & music production
    • Arturia Vids
    • Cubase Basics
    • Cubase Tutorials
    • General Music Production
    • Hardware Synthesizers
    • Maschine+
    • Maschine Tutorials
    • Native Instruments Expansions
    • Virtual Instruments
  • Jordan Rudess - American keyboardist, composer, and software developer - voted “Best Keyboardist of All Time”
  • Liam Killen - electronic music producer sharing how to create music
  • Loopop - in-depth electronic music & synth ideas tips, tricks & reviews
  • LotusTunes Academy - learn about deep & organic house music production
  • Martin Stürtzer - an Ambient / Electronic / Dub Techno artist from Wuppertal (Germany). He works with analog, digital, hardware and virtual instruments to create Ambient, Electronic and Dub Techno music
  • Mastering․com - turn self-producing artists into professionally trained mastering engineers in just 9 weeks
  • Mattias Holmgren - guides you in music production, sound design and creativity
  • Mix with the Masters - offers the unique opportunity to work closely with the world’s top music mixers, producers and engineers and to improve one’s skills in music production
  • Multiplier - electronic music production tutorials, reviews, vlogs, Ableton Live & Serum tutorials …
  • muzykujkropka.com - testujemy instrumenty, aplikacje iOS i różne akcesoria dla Apple
  • Native Instruments Native Instruments official YouTube channel
  • Nu-Trix The Synth Guy - synthesizer reviews & music production
  • Piano From Scratch - resource to help you become a better student and learn the building blocks of music
  • Pick Yourself - helps electronic music producers finish music they’re proud of
  • PlugInGuru - created by John “Skippy” Lehmkuhl (Korg sound designer), home of the amazing Unify plugin
  • Point Blank Music School - music school with courses in London, LA, Ibiza & Online
  • Producing In The Box - how to make incredible-sounding music in the box!
  • ProjectSAM - official channel of the creators of the acclaimed Symphobia Series, Orchestral Essentials Series and Swing! sample libraries
  • Rachel K Collier - Welsh electronic producer & performer who makes songs and performances with Ableton
  • Raveyard Sounds - music production tutorials
  • Rick Beato - everything music
  • Rhodes Piano - official Rhodes channel
  • Rob Papen - powerful instruments and plug-ins that bring together innovative design, uncompromising sound quality, and musical, production-grade presets to make your tracks shine
  • Roland - music production hardware
  • SamTheBeardGuy - virtual instrument reviews
  • Sanjay C - music production, gear & tips
  • School of Synthesis
  • Seed To Stage - Anthony Thogmartin creating deeply informative instructional videos for learning how to use Ableton Live
  • Simeon Amburgey (PraiseTracks) - virtual instrument reviews
    • Heavyocity
    • Native Instruments Kontakt
    • Past Livestreams
    • Plugin Guru UNIFY
    • Vienna Symphonic Library
    • Virtual Instrument Reviews
    • Virtual Pianos, Searching For The Best
  • Slynk - Ableton tutorials
  • SonicState - gear reviews, interviews and features
  • Sound On Sound - recording & music technology magazine
  • Sounds Good - educational videos about music
  • Spectrasonics - official Spectrasonics videos for Omnisphere & Keyscape
  • State Azure - electronic music producer from the UK
  • Studio - hands-on learning platform for cultivating your creative side
  • Sweetwater - giving music makers the ultimate shopping experience
  • Tom Salta - ASCAP award-winning and BAFTA-nominated composer Tom Salta is one of the most versatile and prolific music artists/producers working in film, television, advertising, and video games
  • True Cuckoo - taking synths, bleeps, dance and pop to the stage.
  • Underdog Electronic Music School
  • Venus Theory - music production & reviews
    • Bass Design
    • Bitwig Tutorials
    • Gear and Reviews
    • Hardware Stuff
    • Morning Coffee with Cameron
    • Music Theory Stuff
    • Producer Tips
    • Production Tutorials
    • Sound Design Stuff
    • UVI Falcon Tutorial Series
  • Vulture Culture - uncovering the hidden gems of the synth world
  • Woody Piano Shack - music production & reviews
  • Yamaha Global - official Yamaha Corporation YouTube channel
  • Yamaha Music Europe - official YouTube Channel of Yamaha Music Europe

item.title: News: Arturia Collection X
item.description: Overview [Arturia] have just released V Collection X - A premium suite of software instruments for unparalleled sonic exploration; from evocative emulations and hybrid synth engines, to authentically modeled keyboards and beautifully captured acoustic sounds - enhanced for today’s production workflow. Immerse yourself in an unparalleled music-making experience with iconic sounds and essential tools to suit your style, performance needs and production workflow. 39 instruments, 3 exclusive expansion packs, thousands of world-class presets - 1 canvas for infinite sonic exploration.
item.content:encoded:
Overview

[Arturia] have just released V Collection X - A premium suite of software instruments for unparalleled sonic exploration; from evocative emulations and hybrid synth engines, to authentically modeled keyboards and beautifully captured acoustic sounds - enhanced for today’s production workflow.

Immerse yourself in an unparalleled music-making experience with iconic sounds and essential tools to suit your style, performance needs and production workflow. 39 instruments, 3 exclusive expansion packs, thousands of world-class presets - 1 canvas for infinite sonic exploration.

V Collection X now includes

  • 39 instruments
  • 2 new instruments: CP-70 & Augmented Woodwinds
  • 2 added instruments: Mini Freak V & Acid V
  • 2 additional augmented series: Augmented Grand Piano & Augmented Brass
  • 10,000 high-quality presets

Full Instrument List

  • ARP 2600 V
  • Acid V
  • Analog Lab Pro
  • Augmented BRASS
  • Augmented GRAND PIANO
  • Augmented STRINGS
  • Augmented VOICES
  • Augmented WOODWINDS
  • B-3 V
  • Buchla Easel V
  • CMI V
  • CP-70 V
  • CS-80 V
  • CZ V
  • Clavinet V
  • DX7 V
  • Emulator II V
  • Farfisa V
  • Hyper Rave
  • Inner City Soul
  • Inward Universe
  • Jun-6 V
  • Jup-8 V
  • Korg MS-20 V
  • Matrix-12 V
  • Mellotron V
  • Mini V
  • Mini V 4
  • MiniFreak V
  • Modular V
  • OP-Xa V
  • Piano V
  • Pigments
  • Prophet-5 V
  • Prophet-VS V
  • SEM V
  • SQ80 V
  • Solina V
  • Stage-73 V
  • Synclavier V
  • Synthi V
  • VOX Continental V
  • Vocoder V
  • Wurli V
  • Wurli V 3

Review

Price

Full Price: £599 (Upgrade: £399)

Full Details

Full details can be found here

item.title: News: Arturia FX Collection 4
item.description: Overview [Arturia] have just released FX Collection 4 which now includes 30 effects. There is currently an intro offer, you can get 40% off until 20th June 2023 List price: £429 Discounted price: £257 Note: If you’re an owner of other Arturia products you will likely get an even bigger discount The following effects have been added since collection 3; Rotary CLS-222 - reimagines the classic Dynacord® rotary speaker emulator as a creative plugin that goes from silky smooth stereo swirls to spinning synchronized patterns - enhancing your sound with extra width, momentum, and analog character in seconds Dist COLDFIRE - dual-engine distortion effect that goes from rich tube saturation to unrestrained sonic destruction in a few clicks Filter MS-20 - stereo filter and distortion effect modeled on the infamously abrasive MS-20 synthesizer Rev LX-24 - an enhanced virtual replica of a retro ambience box that defined reverb for a generation Full details can be found here
item.content:encoded:
Overview

[Arturia] have just released FX Collection 4 which now includes 30 effects.

There is currently an intro offer, you can get 40% off until 20th June 2023

  • List price: £429
  • Discounted price: £257
  • Note: If you’re an owner of other Arturia products you will likely get an even bigger discount

The following effects have been added since collection 3;

  • Rotary CLS-222 - reimagines the classic Dynacord® rotary speaker emulator as a creative plugin that goes from silky smooth stereo swirls to spinning synchronized patterns - enhancing your sound with extra width, momentum, and analog character in seconds
  • Dist COLDFIRE - dual-engine distortion effect that goes from rich tube saturation to unrestrained sonic destruction in a few clicks
  • Filter MS-20 - stereo filter and distortion effect modeled on the infamously abrasive MS-20 synthesizer
  • Rev LX-24 - an enhanced virtual replica of a retro ambience box that defined reverb for a generation

Full details can be found here

YouTube Videos

FX Collection 4 | Find your sonic perfection | ARTURIA

Exploring Arturia FX Collection 4

The Arturia Fx Collection 4 is a Must-have ! Now with Rotary fx plugin

item.title: News: Native Instruments Sale (50% off)
item.description: Native Instruments’ amazing Summer of Sound is back. Get 50% off all KOMPLETE 14 upgrades, step up to the latest instruments and effects, or save on a range of expansions 50% off Komplete 14 upgrades 50% off Traktor Pro 3 updates 50% off Instrument & effect upgrades 50% off iZotope All offers end on 6th July 2023 See the full details here; https://www.native-instruments.com/en/catalog/summer-of-sound-2023/komplete-bundles/ Summer of Sound Sale (2023)
item.content:encoded:
Native Instruments’ amazing Summer of Sound is back.

Get 50% off all KOMPLETE 14 upgrades, step up to the latest instruments and effects, or save on a range of expansions

All offers end on 6th July 2023

item.title: News: Ableton Push 3
item.description: About Ableton have just announced they have a new version of their Push controller Ableton Push 3 Standalone There are 2 configurations Push 3 Standalone Push 3 £1,669 £879 Use Push as a standalone instrument Connect Push to your computer 64 expressive pads 64 expressive pads Built-in audio interface Built-in audio interface Intel 11th Gen Core™ i3-1115G4 processor with 8GB of RAM Add a processor, battery and hard drive later using the Upgrade Kit - £879 (available late 2023) Built-in lithium battery with up to 2.
item.content:encoded:
About

Ableton have just announced they have a new version of their Push controller

There are 2 configurations

Push 3 Standalone Push 3
£1,669 £879
Use Push as a standalone instrument Connect Push to your computer
64 expressive pads 64 expressive pads
Built-in audio interface Built-in audio interface
Intel 11th Gen Core™ i3-1115G4 processor with 8GB of RAM Add a processor, battery and hard drive later using the Upgrade Kit - £879 (available late 2023)
Built-in lithium battery with up to 2.5 hours play time
Built-in 256GB SSD hard drive
Replace processor, battery and hard drive as technology improves

Full Comparison

  • https://www.ableton.com/en/push/tech-specs/#compare-configurations-for-push

YouTube Videos

Introducing Push 3: An expressive standalone instrument

5 Cool Features of ABLETON PUSH 3
